name: Shotgun City
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 40. Started this about 5 hours before the deadline, as what I was initially working on didn't go to plan. Shotguns!

EDIT: So I feel like the "5 hours" thing is a bit disingenuous. While I did create the project 5 hours before the deadline, I didn't create everything included from scratch in those 5 hours. For example, the rain effect is a piece of code I'd made for a game in the latest GMC Jam. The shotgun I had drawn the night before, when I was planning something different for LD40. The movement code for the player, I just grabbed that out of another top-down project of mine.
